ygData.subject: Re: Necro Spells..?

ygData.messageBody:
http://gameznet.com/eq/

This is an EXCELLENT site.

Malark

> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Lecouffe [mailto:puma@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 4:17 PM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Necro Spells..?
>
>
> From: "James Lecouffe" <puma@...>
>
> I typed www.eqlizer.com and there no sight. Can you give that
> sight agian?
> thanks
> -----Original Message-----

> To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com' <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>

> >From: Juan Custer <JuanC@...>
> >
> >
> > Just go to EQ'Lizer or EQ Stratics for a better list. The list at
> >EQ'Lizer is very filled up and seems to be the best version
> so far. Note
> >that Corpse Bomb is not in the game and the Grim Aura merely
> adds 10 to
> your
> >ATK or something.
> >
> >Malark, Karana
> >
